name: Submarine Rescue
description:
Submarine Rescue is a fun 2D game which challenges you by facing multiple dangers.

Endure the largest number of waves of enemies aboard the rescue submarine that protects the last survivors of the planet.

Game mode:
Move the submarine from left to right by clicking on the screen until you reach the main base.
You are given three lives to reach the highest possible score.

Characteristics:
• Endure waves of enemies and exceed your maximum score.
• Enjoy an intense adventure to rescue the last survivors of the planet.
• 2D design with Cartoon aesthetics.
• Powers to discover.
• Infinite levels.
• Leaderboards.
• Accessibility and easy of play suitable for all ages.
• Simple but challenging game!
